PhyMediumComments: black-and-white: Ansco Supreme Pan safety film
CatDescriptText: The sign on the wall in the background has drawings of a scientist, football player, military officer, doctor, marquee with the inscription "Ann Lucasta All Negro Cast," and a politician with "Re-elect Congress" written behind a likeness of Adam Clayton Powell, Jr. The inscription on the bottom reads, "...And Daily Negroes are Forging Ahead in the Sciences and the Arts. Recognition Dependent Upon Ability Rather Than Race. Therein Lies the Only True Hope for Democracy."  A sign on the left reads, "Hey Kids! Join The Center Now!! Membership Rates:- Juniors 10 yrs. age and younger $.10, Intermediates 11-13 yrs - $.20, Inter. Seniors 14-16 yrs. - $.30, Seniors 17-20 yrs. $.40, Adults 21 and over $.50   Enroll With These Groups...Children's, Theatre, Art Class, Cartoon...Jewelry, Chorus..."
TitMainTitle: Girl wearing jacket with hood looking at large poster with drawings of African American historical figures and events, including Liberty Ship Robert L. Vann
